description: Frontend developer has 0% utilization in Sprints 1 & 4 while Backend/Mobile are heavily loaded
mitigation_strategy: Assign TASK-MAP-001 (Mobile Map UI) to Frontend Dev (React skill transferrable to React Native)
contingency_plan: Frontend dev assists with documentation and QA if coding transfer fails
monitoring_trigger: Sprint 3 end - check Frontend dev React Native readiness

description: Single Backend developer responsible for Auth, Geo-routing, and Real-time sockets
mitigation_strategy: DevOps Lead to assist with Redis/Infrastructure setup (TASK-RT-002) to offload Backend dev
contingency_plan: Simplify WebSocket implementation to polling if complexity spikes
